title: light, easy to use, needs many improvements
comment: plz add auto start up with the system hide status bar notifications  try to add complete hidden mode to be able to use in business
Auto start up is already implemented. As for hiding, android does not allow to hide an app for security reasons.

title: Great app.. Work fine...
comment: Is it possible to store data if gprs or internet connections is down and send when available all backlog..
Great App and excellent support.
Very easy to use

title: Really excellent!
comment: I'm usually very restrictive with stars but this is a 5 star. It works straight out of the box exactly as advertised.   For future versions it would be nice to be able to turn off/on remotely via e.g SMS to be able to locate a lost phone

title: This is a great tool
comment: It's greatness is in its simplicity. The app is very simple to navigate and doesn't require a PHD to configure :). I installed the Traccar server on a test box, and was able to see tracking data without issues. I loud the fact that the author is keeping it open source! This can turn out to be a real platform for my future tracking implementations.. Thanks Anton!!!
Very good work

title: Great app
comment: Like it a lot...

title: It does
comment: Does exactly what it promises. Nothing more, nothing less. :)

title: Excellent@@@
comment: Best among all

title: Is there traccar client app in blackberry version?
comment: I have successfully installed server, and droid client.  I curious to know if traccar has client app for blackberry / java based phone?  Thanks to Anton. Great Apps!
No, there is no BlackBerry version yet, but I have plans to do it at some point.

comment: This is an excellent application and the developer deserves every success with it.

title: Brilliant
comment: Just what we need ... So lightweight .. Accurate ... Expect a donation as i will want to integrate  this to my web application .. Well done.

comment: anton thanks :)

title: Спасибо, Антон!
comment: This is a great tool, smart to use, light to wear. I have installed the whole Traccar trio (data server, web server and droid client). One click install, absolutely no initial setup configuration. The client app is small and lightweight, minimal traffic/battery consumption. Our company is going to integrate Traccar into our CRM system. So a good donation is pending! ;)  Thanks for Traccar, Anton! Good luck and success!  Aram Paronikyan MerSoft Inc. Yerevan, Armenia
